entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Port Colborne

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
